00017 void SPI_InitMaster(int clkDivider){
00018 
00019         PINSEL0 |= 1<<10;       //p0.5 Pin sel for MISO0
00020         PINSEL0 |= 1<<12;       //p0.6 Pin sel for MOSI0
00021         PINSEL0 |= 1<<8;        //p0.4 Pin sel for SCK0
00022 
00023         S0SPCCR = clkDivider;        //Clock counter reg, spi clk = PCLK/speed_divider
00024         SPI_SetLength(8);               //default sending 8 bit mode
00025 }

00036 void SPI_InitSlave(int clkDivider, void (*callback)(void) __irq){
00037         VICVectAddr1 = (unsigned long)callback;
00038         VICVectCntl1 = 0x2A; // Channel0 on Source#10 ... enabled
00039         VICIntEnable |= 0x400; // 10th bit is the SPI0 interrupt
00040 
00041         PINSEL0 |= 1<<10;       //p0.5 Pin sel for MISO0
00042         PINSEL0 |= 1<<12;       //p0.6 Pin sel for MOSI0
00043         PINSEL0 |= 1<<8;        //p0.4 Pin sel for SCK0
00044         PINSEL0 |= 1<<14;       //p0.7 Pin sel for SSEL0
00045 
00046         S0SPCR= (0<<3) | //CPHA=0
00047                 (0<<4) | //CPOL=0
00048                 (0<<5) | //Slave mode
00049                 (1<<7) | //SPIE=1 
00050                 (1<<2) | //16 bit 
00051                 (0<<8) | (0<<9) | (0<<10) | (0<11);//16 bit
00052         //control reg, phase=0, polarity=0,
00053         //slave mode, 16bits, MSB transfer first, interrupt enable
00054 }
00055 
00062 void SPI_SetLength(int length){
00063         if(length == 8){
00064                 S0SPCR = (0<<3) | //CPHA=0
00065                         (0<<4)  | //CPOL=0
00066                         (1<<5)  | //master mode
00067                         (0<<6)  ;//MSB (bit 7) first  
00068                 //control reg, phase=0, polarity=0,
00069                 //master mode, 8bits, MSB transfer first, interrupt inhibit
00070         }
00071         else if(length == 16){
00072                 S0SPCR= (1<<2) | //16 bit
00073                         (0<<3) | //CPHA=0
00074                         (0<<4) | //CPOL=0
00075                         (1<<5) | //master mode
00076                         (0<<8) | (0<<9) | (0<<10) | (0<11);//16 bit
00077                 //control reg, phase=0, polarity=0,
00078                 //master mode, 16bits, MSB transfer first, interrupt inhibit
00079         }
00080         else{
00081                 //error
00082 //              Uart_Print("SPI_setLength");
00083 //              Uart_Print("(): wrong length, only 8 or 16 is allowed");
00084 //              Uart_Print("\r\n");
00085 //              exit(0);
00086                 return ;
00087         }
00088 }

00099 int SPI_Send(int data){
00100         int retval = 0;
00101         S0SPDR = data; 
00102         while((S0SPSR&0x80)==0){
00103         }       //wait until the trasnfer(send) is completed
00104         retval = S0SPDR;// get data
00105         return retval;
00106 }
00120 int SPI_Recieve(void){
00121         return SPI_Send(1);
00122 }
